document_data.name: Tarrik Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tarrik Dynasty''', which was also referred to as the '''Demon Dynasty''', briefly ruled over the nation of [[Impiltur]] from [[726 DR]] to [[729 DR]].

Monarchs.King [[Argosh|Argosh the Scaled]]: Reigned 726 DR – 729 DR. Argosh was a [[half-fiend]] son of a duke who claimed the throne after the death of King [[Forvar II]].
